itunes:title: getting over the 'I'll start tomorrow mindset' + britt's new training app
title: getting over the 'I'll start tomorrow mindset' + britt's new training app
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
description:
Britt is here to help you ditch the, "I"ll starting over tomorrow" mindset for Summer, and for good! Tune in to chat about why over-compensating is counterintuitive, nutrition on vacation, why Britt never skips breakfast, listening to & caring for your body, hunger cues, progress, mindset shifts & more!

Train with Britt Start Your 7 Day Free Trial Today!

Shop Gymshark Shop my favorite Gym Fits!
